comments.body:
Maybe we should end with 

```scala

abstract class Any:
  def asInstanceOf
  def ==
  def !=
  def ##
  def equals
  def hashCode
  def toString

trait Matchable extends Any:
  def isInstanceOf
  def getClass

class AnyVal extends Any, Matchable

class Object extends Any, Matchable
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +85,89 @@`Matchable` is currently a marker trait without any methods. Over time
we might migrate methods `getClass` and `isInstanceOf` to it, since these are closely related to pattern-matching.
